nodes.text: The G-32 evasive armor plating was a type of starship armor developed by Santhe Corporation by the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Custom-designed by Santhe engineers for each supported class of starship, the G-32 plating increased the ship's maneuverability by accommodating the ship's shape, thruster locations, and gravity field generators.
